item.description:
Specific Topic: Exploring Regression

Update: Kevin Linehan, author of the just released "The Past Life Regression Project - Explorations in Hypnosis", will speak about his book and about regression.

We will still have open discussion and at least one demo.

This topic was such a hit in Lexington, I have been asked to do this in Methuen.

Tonight, we explore regression.  Regression is where we go back in time to an event or events in our past.  We go back for purposes of healing or just wonderment.

We will explain the different types of regression, the pros and cons and do's and don'ts.

And we will demonstrate a few of them.


Come Learn and Play!!

 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Exploring Regression
